General.Name: Empire Petroleum Corp
General.Description: Empire Petroleum Corporation engages in the optimization and development of oil and gas interests in the United States. It operates its properties in New Mexico, North Dakota, Montana, Texas, and Louisiana. The company was formerly known as Americomm Resources Corporation and changed its name to Empire Petroleum Corporation in August 2001. Empire Petroleum Corporation was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
General.Address: 2200 South Utica Place, Tulsa, OK, United States, 74114
